text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of this title, an entity that is required to have a resident agent may not designate a person as a resident agent without first obtaining the person's written consent.

section.section: An entity shall file a resident agent's written consent with the Department.
The consent shall be effective upon acceptance by the Department.

text.section: Subsections (a) and (b) of this section do not apply to resident agents designated before October 1, 1998.
A person designated a resident agent may resign without paying the fee under § 1-203(b)(2) of this subtitle.
